menuZone.title: Menu Zone
menuZone.description: Application developed with Flutter that allows users to find the typical Spanish 'menu of the day' around them.
menuZone.f1: Displays restaurants by distance using geohashes Uses the Google API
menuZone.f2: Maps to load default restaurant information

ig4.title: IG4 Reasoned Agriculture
ig4.description: Application developed for IG4 Agronomy using Ionic. The goal of this app is to show farmers organized information in charts about variables, such as the weather, that affect their crops.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I found in programming the perfect hobby and job for this curiosity. Not only because of that, but also because, although I like talking to people and socializing, I consider myself an introvert and love the feeling of being in front of the code with my music.

Among some of my personal achievements is having worked as a freelance developer creating apps for various startups, as I always wanted to know what it was like to work on my own, although I left it after a year because I spent a lot of energy looking for clients and handling bureaucracy. I have also managed to have two apps with thousands of downloads on the Play Store (Stormii and Consumii). Lastly, I achieved one of my dreams: traveling solo through Asia without dying in the attempt (so far). Although this may seem quite irrelevant to programming, I feel that it has greatly improved my problem-solving skills.
